entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 early this evening then west 30 late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
